English translation: The life of the land is perpetuated in righteousness/*The sovereignty of the land is perpetuated in righteousness
Motto: Ua mau ke ea o ka ʻāina i ka pono

English translation: Our liberties we prize and our rights we will maintain
Motto: Our liberties we prize and our rights we will maintain

English translation: United we stand, divided we fall
Motto: United we stand, divided we fall

English translation: Let us be grateful to God
By the sword we seek peace, but peace only under liberty
Motto: Ense petit placidam sub libertate quietem

English translation: If you seek a pleasant peninsula, look about you
Let the welfare of the people be the supreme law
To be, rather than to seem
Liberty and union, now and forever, one and inseparable
Motto: Liberty and union, now and forever, one and inseparable

English translation: One sows for the benefit of another age
With God, all things are possible[N 9]
Motto: With God, all things are possible[N 9]

English translation: She flies with her own wings
May the fourteenth star shine bright
